00010 namespace glm
00011 {
00012         template <typename genType>
00013         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER genType extend
00014         (
00015                 genType const & Origin, 
00016                 genType const & Source, 
00017                 genType const & Distance
00018         )
00019         {
00020                 return Origin + (Source - Origin) * Distance;
00021         }
00022

00025         (
00026                 detail::tvec2<T, P> const & Origin,
00027                 detail::tvec2<T, P> const & Source,
00028                 T const & Distance
00029         )
00030         {
00031                 return Origin + (Source - Origin) * Distance;
00032         }
